product_name: INNO Shadow 15 Low Profile Cargo Roof Box - Matte Black
long_description: The matte black INNO Shadow 15 Low Profile Cargo Roof Box has a sleek, aerodynamic design for a quiet ride and good looks, and its single-handed, dual-side opening makes loading and unloading easy. Universal mounting hardware mounts to square, round and most factory crossbars. 15 cu. ft. capacity accommodates 6-8 pairs of skis or 4 snowboards. Durable, lightweight 3-layer ABS construction features a stiff bottom for stability. Includes locks and keys; matte black finish.
short_description: The matte black INNO Shadow 15 Low Profile Cargo Roof Box has a sleek, aerodynamic design for a quiet ride and good looks, and its single-handed, dual-side opening makes loading and unloading easy.
